Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: 1. Understand the Goal: The user wants me to analyze a provided event log of a support workflow, identify recurring activities within the same case that have different meanings based on context, rename them to be more descriptive, present the revised log, and justify the naming choices. 2. Analyze the Event Log: Case C001: Initiate Request Start, Verify Documents First check incomplete, Call Customer Request missing docs, Submit Additional Customer action, Verify Documents Second check after submission recurrence, Approve Request End. Case C002: ... Call Customer recurrence. Case C003: Verify Documents recurrence.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 3. Identify Recurring Activities and Contextual Differences: Activity Verify Documents Instance 1 General Initial verification. Instance 2 C001 and C003 Second verification re-check after submission or adjustment. Activity Call Customer Instance 1 various purposes request info clarify discrepancy recall. Instance 2 C002 confirm adjustments.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: 4. Develop Renaming Strategy: Verify Documents First pass Initial Document Verification. Second pass Re-verify Updated Documents or Secondary Document Verification. Refine based on preceding events. Call Customer specific like Call to Request Missing Documents.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Self-Correction: Some names might be getting too long. Lets try to be concise but distinct. Wait can I generalize better? Renaming Verify Documents to Initial Verification vs Re-Verification.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: 5. Drafting the New Names Iterative Refinement: C001 Verify Documents 1 Initial Document Verification, Call Customer Call to Request Missing Docs, Verify Documents 2 Verify Resubmitted Documents. Similar specific drafts for other cases using context clues like Submit Additional precedes or Adjust Account.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: 8. Final Review of the Revised Log: Refining C003 Verify Documents 1 In-Person Document Verification distinct branch context. Refining C001 2nd Verify Resubmitted Documents precise. Refining Call Customer intents like Call to Request Info Call to Resolve Discrepancy.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: 6. Formatting the Output: I need a table for the revised log and a text section for the justification. 7. Writing the Justification: For Verify Documents differentiate initial screening and secondary checks. For Call Customer differentiate based on intent.
